name: I am  Windar Lobo Garces
description: My name is  Windar Lobo Garces  and I am a full stack developer.
my-description: I dedicated myself to web development, I am constantly learning about the technologies that I already master, I also seek to learn new technologies to enrich my skills and improve my good practices as a developer..
about-info-1: Hello, I am Windar Lobo Garces, a student at Colegio de Fomento Montecastelo in Galicia, Spain. I consider myself a person passionate about programming and web development.
about-info-2: I am a self-taught individual because I enjoy constantly learning every day, whether it's about new technologies or new development methods that help me refine and elevate my level of knowledge.
